text: Princess Diana in 1995 with her sons, Prince William, right, and Prince Harry, center, at a World War II commemoration in London. She died in a car crash in 1997. ( Johnny Eggitt / AFP / Getty Images ) When Prince Harry and Meghan Markle were married Saturday, there was one royal missing but not forgotten : Harry ’ s mother, Princess Diana. Harry and his older brother, Prince William, have made sure to include their beloved late mother in their weddings. [ Listen on Retropod : Princess Diana ’ s final hours ] When William proposed to Kate Middleton in 2010, the engagement ring he gave her once belonged to Diana. And Harry proposed to Markle with an engagement ring containing diamonds from Diana ’ s jewelry collection. Markle is the same age as Diana when she died :
